name: cyan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a deep greenish-blue colour, one of the main colours that are used in colour printing and photography
chingraph/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

having a deep greenish-blue colour: The cyan ink fades within a matter of days. Monasteries cling to cliff faces above the shimmering cyan waters of the Aegean Sea.
More examplesFewer examplesOn her feet she wears cyan sandals with fuchsia pink jewels.The sky of Uranus is probably a cyan colour.The kit comes in a beautiful cyan blue plastic case.
